verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
To be in your presence
To sit at your feet
When your love surrounds me
And makes me complete

verse.name: c
verse.lines:
This is my desire, O Lord
This is my desire
This is my desire, O Lord
This is my desire

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
To rest in your presence
Not rushing away
To cherish each moment
Here I would stay
